reviews.review:
Game that definitely stand the test of time.
Screw GO, ALL HAIL SOURCE!
Can run 60fps with no graphics card lmao

It's very good game but there are not players to play with almost every server has 0 players.Also there aren't original servers from valve so you have to play on random bad made servers.I think that was one of the best games ever made but it is just out dated cause everyone is playing CS:GO.Don't go for CS:Source just go for CS:GO it is much better and it's up to date so all of your friends keep playing it.

This game brings back so many good memories from the good ol'days of CS:GO, fun to play, very few hackers, I have yet to encounter any Russians/griefers alike (reviewed after about 6 hours in game). For me I actually prefer the graphics of this game, I enjoy the style of game, it seems more fast paced compared with CS:GO. This game is everything CS:GO should have been, the only downside is that there are no weapon skins and there is only community servers. This game is also easier than CS:GO as the deag action is absurd and you can easily run and gun.
çocukluğunuza dönmek okuldan kaçıp oynadığınız anları hatırlamak için ideal ama biraz gelişmiş hali diyebilirim cs go an sıkılınca kaçıs durağınız burası tavsiyemdir
Играл 8 лет (пиратка) ни разу не надоела!
One of the best games ever played! childhood memory no salty community and no potato mics :D
все мое детство я провел в этой игре ностальгия полные штаны
tämä peli on hyvää ajan vietettä ja mukava pelata suosittelen kaikille jotka tykkää counter strike peli sarjasta
You can use sprays without spending money  or having a limit
Извините мне, что-то в глаз попало и я прослезился!

Написать обзор Counter-Strike: Source
Пожалуйста, опишите, что вам понравилось или не понравилось в этой игре, и порекомендовали бы вы ее другим.
Будьте вежливы и придерживайтесь правил и рекомендаций.

Played this game religiously when it was fairly new.  Now, with so many online multiplayer games out, I just want to go back to my roots.  Too bad my skills have become a bit rusty.  Gotta start as a noob all over again
Mesmo com o passar do tempo, esse jogo é muito top!
Вы точно нуждаетесь в обзоре на эту игру?
jogo top... otimos graficos pena ter ficado desatualizado

Эта часть Контры тепла, лампова, полнится модами и без микротранзакций. Выгодно выделяется для уже пристрастившихся к ней игроков на фоне модной Глобал Оффенсив. Незыблема как Warcraft 3. Удобна и обкатанна как Windows 7.

While I have no where near as many hours in CS:S as I do CS:GO, I would like to go on record and say YES, this game is better than GO. It's smoother, more balanced, and though there is NO competitive mode, the community is very much less toxic. So yes, I would very much recommend this CLASSIC game if you're just looking for a great, community based game to hang out and shoot some stuff in.
At First it was really fun I got it in a bundle with Garry's mod and sometimes I still enjoy playing it but it is an outdated game and there aren't as many fun servers as there were before.
Its a game what more is there to say...well its great game. there. XD

Bought the game, joined an ffa server for my first game. Was accused of hacking and told too kill myself by a bunch of 10 year old australian kids.

10/10 would get told to commit suicide by australian squeakers again.
Best source game for crappy PCs like mine. :D
Great team based multiplayer FPS that really stands the test of time. Always come back to this genre defining shooter.
Best Surfing game, worth every penny!
Pretty cool game, I played 1.6 and GO before this, so I wish this had official 5v5 servers
after all this years.. still a  good game
still to this day the BEST counterstrike version made to date. I dont care what anyone says .. I would play this game over CSGO ANY day of the week.
I played a shit ton of CS:Source when i was little, i just bought the game to show my aprecciation.
Juste le meilleur jeu au monde. 8/8

An update to counter strike og xD 
in graphics and in gameplay :)
Mega Geiles spiel ! Wer nicht die neueste Grafik braucht ist hiermit richtig. Defenitiv zu empfehlen!!!
Есть ли смысл писать обзор на эту игру? Перефразировать то, что и так звучит в массовом сознании общества: "Игра, закат которой будет еще не скоро!"
It's called source because it was the source of all problems with my ex-girlfriend.
Старая и добрая кс, лучше нет ничего
Juego mitico, por mas que pasen los años seguira siendo de los mejores y de los mas jugados.
Immer noch durch eine aktive community am Leben gehalten :)

Для начала скажу пару слов о концепции проекта. Изначально игра задумывалась Valve как возрождение серии Counter Strike - причём упор делался именно на максимальную близость к 1.6. Естественно, при этом обещался симпатичный графон на обновлённом Source, разные новые пухи, обновлённые карты и еще всякие ништячки. Что же из этого вышло?

Всегда приятно возвращаться на старый любимый даст и проводить там вечера с друзьями.
Best game and CS ever
